name: Glitch Dream
description:
The game is a mix of VN-style storytelling with action RPG and adventure elements. Its inspirations include Snatcher, Metal Gear, Akira, Blade Runner and the works of Philip K. Dick, among other influences such as surrealism and slice-of-life.

This is a big project that will probably be sliced into 5 episodes, each of them relatively self-contained. I hope to release the first some time during the first half of 2018.

DEVELOPER MAN

GUKAJOGU — writer, artist, incompetent programmer, person writing this. I've been making silly stuff on the internet for a few years now, including a joke game that got ✧・ﾟpretty popular・ﾟ✧.

Donations and feedback are very much appreciated <3

Serve the mother land.
